Interface AmqpEnvironmentBuilder.EnvironmentConnectionSettings

All Superinterfaces:
ConnectionSettings<AmqpEnvironmentBuilder.EnvironmentConnectionSettings>
Enclosing class:
AmqpEnvironmentBuilder
public static interface AmqpEnvironmentBuilder.EnvironmentConnectionSettings extends ConnectionSettings<AmqpEnvironmentBuilder.EnvironmentConnectionSettings>
Common settings for connections created by an environment instance.
